Explanation: The doctor suggested an Otoscopic Examination, which is similar to 'Otoscopy' and aims to check for signs of an ear infection.
The doctor did not suggest any investigations similar to a Complete Blood Count (CBC) that would assess for signs of infection.
The doctor did not suggest any investigations similar to 'C-reactive protein (CRP)' or provide a justification related to evaluating inflammation levels.
The doctor did not suggest any investigations similar to 'Tympanometry' or provide a justification related to assessing the function of the middle ear.

The doctor did not suggest any investigations similar to a nasopharyngeal swab for viral panel, as all suggested investigations focused on physical examination and assessment of fever rather than identifying viral pathogens.
